title: Map Sampler, 1790s
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, running, speckling and chain stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Two globes titled "Western Hemisphere or the New World" and "Eastern Hemisphere or the Old World". A compass at bottom center, spray of flowers top center, and figures labelled "Europe," "Asia," "America" and "Africa" in each of the corners. The maps have been filled in great detail and the routes of the explorers have been marked on them.

tombstone.epitaph:
Map Sampler, 1790s.Medium: silk and metallic embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, running, speckling and chain stitches on plain weave foundation. 1975-86-22.
